channel.title: Always invisible ? Help please!
channel.description:
Why am I always invisible ? If I tele to someone or climb a ladder like 9 out of 10 times I can't see the person :confused: Why's that? Can someone please tell me how to fix.
Also, if someone would had a better command for ::xteleto and ::xteletome please post it here. I don't know if you guys already used RichScape source, but whatever, those command doesn't work well.
~ Macoronizer

item.title: Always invisible ? Help please!
item.dc:creator: @Macoronizer Macoronizer
item.description:
@Macoronizer wrote:

Lol I’m not changing source with all of the hard work I did -.-
There must be a way that you can get rid of those glitch.
Please guys ! if you know how, tell me, I really, really really need to know how !

Read full topic

item.title: Always invisible ? Help please!
item.dc:creator: @Goth_Wolf Goth Wolf
item.description:
@Goth_Wolf wrote:

RichScape ladders/teleports are pretty glitchy i would suggest using a different source

Read full topic
